value:
Pirates take as they please. I live
my life in much the same way.
Only my garb has changed.

This look is stylish—and it breathes
well too. I'm rather fond of it.

Not all pirates enjoy looting and
pillaging, I'm sure... Some simply
do what they must to survive.

Pirate garb would not suit a member
of the heron clan. Make sure Leanne
knows that she should not imitate me.

King Tibarn is here as well, is he?
If we encounter one another, I fear
it may dredge up old grudges...$k$pThat may present a problem.

If you want not to die, place your
valuables on the ground and get out
of here before I change my mind.$k$p...Only kidding! The pirate festival is
on at $Nf's keep.

The strong take whatever they want.
Pirates aren't the only people who
follow that particular code...

Well...seems I've won. Hand over all
you've got, or you walk the plank!
...Just play along, for the festival.

Guh... Feels like the winds
have changed.

This is no bauble... Seems as if the
treasure has found me for once!

You cast I, Naesala, King of Kilvas, as
a dastard pirate? Is this your idea of
a joke? I expect reparation for this...

The strong take from the weak.
It's been that way forever. It's an
immutable fact of life.$k$pThat is why the raven tribe went
from being the taken-from to being
the takers—to survive.$k$pI'll leave the moral debate for future
philosophers to argue over. What is
important is the side you choose.$k$pOne needs to be prepared to be
taken from if one is to become a
taker. Are you...prepared for that?$k$p...Heh. Only kidding. I wouldn't
think of taking anything from
you, of course.$k$pI'm simply having a peck of festival
fun. You can trust me.
へっ
おらっ！
くっ…
やるな…
If you don't mind!
No use hiding!
Where's the treasure?
Just your luck.
What a mess...
Sigh
Sure, a pirate festival may be a delight for the senses, but...is it in good taste?
Hm! You should pick your fights more carefully.
Of course this suits me. I was already halfway there.
Sure, put a pile of treasure in front of me and I'll be whatever you want—a pirate, a bandit... You say the word!
Everyone here seems so carefree... Is this what peace looks like?
Leanne saw me and said she wants to dress up too, but... I don't know if this is her style...
Tell me what you need—anything—and I'll snatch it up! ...Well, for a price.
I hear you.
Oh...right.
Chart the course.
